name: Gay Sex Adventures - Episode 6
description:
An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD GRAPHICS and realistic-looking characters.
Tony needs a personal assistant to help with the business during the day and warm his bed at night. The interview with the two potential candidates turns into a hot menage with a lot of fisting involved.

GAME DESCRIPTION

Meet Tony and embark on his wild Sex Adventure as he rediscovers life as a single guy.

EPISODE 6
Tony’s company has experienced significant growth in the past year, and he finds himself in need of a personal assistant to help him better manage his time.
However, he’s not just after skills.
With his husband now out of the picture and a hectic travel schedule, he figured it’s best to find a willing partner who won’t shy away from warming his bed at night.
His secretary noted this additional requirement and arranged an interview with two equally skilled and handsome candidates, both more than happy to accommodate Tony’s unique needs.

Will Tony find the right man for the job?
Follow his Sex Adventure and find out!

FEATURES

- HD renders
- Image gallery
